poem:
### Sibiu, A Medieval Treasure

In quiet creases of the heart,  
Sibiu stands, a whispered tale  
of time's embrace. Amidst old stones,  
St. Mary's spire lifts the soul.  
Attic eyes, serene and knowing,  
watch dreams dance like shadows  
over cobbled paths, where past  
and present waltz in silent  
harmony, crafted for the seeker's  
gentle pause.

The characteristic design of attic windows makes it clear why Sibiu". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
